title: Hero Moment Or Choke Job?
description:
Tony Kornheiser and Michael Wilbon discuss if Yordan Àlvarez’s home run was a hero moment or a choke job for the Mariners, if they like Yu Darvish or Clayton Kershaw in tonight's Padres/Dodgers matchup and and Booger McFarland joins the show for 5 Good Minutes. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Tony Kornheiser, Michael Wilbon
itunes:subtitle: PTI: Yordan Àlvarez's walk off home run and tonight's Padres/Dodgers matchup.
